sentences.sContent: Sobbing with rage, Carol was taken to the hospital.
sentences.sCn: 卡罗尔气得呜呜哭，被送往医院。

sentences.sContent: Richens was 17 when he flew into a rage and stabbed another teenager.
sentences.sCn: 里琴斯17岁那年一怒之下捅了一名少年。

synos.tran: 愤怒；狂暴，肆虐；情绪激动

phrases.pCn: 暴怒行为（主要是指驾驶人因不耐前车或不满抢道而引起的愤怒）

trans.tranCn: 愤怒；狂暴，肆虐；情绪激动
trans.tranOther: a strong feeling of uncontrollable anger
to feel very angry about something and show this in the way you behave or speak
